definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards

sentences.english: The plant is at a distance of 12km to Dabaodang Town . with convenient traffic and excellent surroundings.
sentences.chinese: 该厂距大保当镇12公里，交通便利，环境优美。

sentences.english: And when I stopped by at a convenience store in Nagoya, I found this.
sentences.chinese: 当我顺路去名古屋的便利店时，我找到了这个。

sentences.english: Its road traffic is fairly convenient, ranking the key land post in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 道路交通便利，是上海的陆上要津。

sentences.english: One option is to shift trade facilitation from a negotiation to a development plan.
sentences.chinese: 一种方案是将贸易便利化从谈判转变为发展计划。

sentences.english: Taipei features abundant living requirements and convenient traffic routes.
sentences.chinese: 台北拥有最便利的生活机能以及密集的交通网。

sentences.english: You wanna die by Post-its? Because I could make that happen.
sentences.chinese: 你想被便利贴弄死吗？因为我可以做到。

sentences.english: Recruiting departments shall take measures to facilitate citizens' registration for examination.
sentences.chinese: 招录机关应当采取措施，便利公民报考。

sentences.english: The Moroccan government will create conditions and provide facilitations for the cooperation between businesses of both countries.
sentences.chinese: 摩洛哥政府将为两国企业合作创造条件，提供便利。

sentences.english: Like a 24hr convenience store, being there when you need it.
sentences.chinese: 像24小时的便利商店，在你需要的时候出现。

sentences.english: So we have transport facilities, labor force, preferential polities as well as abundant raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 原材料充足，劳动资源丰富，交通便利，政策优惠。

sentences.english: Modem educational aids would be used with great facility.
sentences.chinese: 现代化的教辅工具使用非常便利。
总之，我住的地方真的很便利。

sentences.english: Even so, the on-the-go convenience of mobile banking is attracting users in the West.
sentences.chinese: 即便如此，移动银行的便利性也正吸引西方用户。

sentences.english: Ensure non-fuel business merchandising in convenient store of service station.
sentences.chinese: 确保加油站便利店非油品产品的供应。

sentences.english: The Viking dual ability is handy.
sentences.chinese: 维京双重能力是便利的。

definition: convenient/suitable/to facilitate/to make things easy/having money to spare/(euphemism) to relieve oneself
to facilitate/expedite/make convenient and fast/speed up
to go out somewhere (relatively short trip)/to set off on a journey (longer trip)
roads open in all directions (idiom); accessible from all sides
(of systems, facilities etc) comprehensive/well-developed/excellent/to refine/to improve
saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
